If client-control over the URI is what you are after, have you
considered making a "suggested URI" part of the message you POST when
creating a new resource? The server than has the option to take up your
suggestion or to ignore it. The actual URI of the new resource is
returned in the 'Location' response header of the "201 Created" you will
get back. That's how we implemented this for RESTx
(http://restx.mulesoft.org).
